helpInfo:
If you are having issues with processing your gift, you may need to
update your browser. For assistance, please call 800-123-4567.
labelTribute: Give in honor or memory of someone
labelTributeNotify: Would you like to notify someone of your gift?
labelPaymentFee: I want 100% of my donation to go to the {{organization}}. I will add {{amount}} to my donation to cover credit card transaction fees.
